mods.name: Farm Counter
description: Adds a customiseable farm counter to keep track of your runs.
tagline: Adds a customiseable farm counter to keep track of your runs.

mods.name: Movement Tech
description: Allows for double jumps and slamming in BL2.
tagline: Allows for double jumps and slamming in BL2.

mods.name: Difficulty Modes
description: Replaces BAR with a difficulty mode that can be changed in the options.
tagline: Replaces BAR with a difficulty mode that can be changed in the options.
